bulkoperationprefix.description: Prefix used for bulk operation numbering.

decimalsymbol.description: Symbol used for decimal in Microsoft Dynamics 365.

featureset.description: Features to be enabled as an XML BLOB.

enum: Last Name, First Name, Middle Initial
First Name, Middle Initial, Last Name

Last Name, no space, First Name

enum: No preference for sending an error report to Microsoft about Microsoft Dynamics 365
Ask me for permission to send an error report to Microsoft
Automatically send an error report to Microsoft without asking me for permission
Never send an error report to Microsoft about Microsoft Dynamics 365
